data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_04e575d648d7f7ac1174f4369595c3a2.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Every 4s, Faramis' next skill against enemy heroes and summoned objects generates a soul fragment on the spot. Faramis can absorb the soul fragment to restore 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> HP and gain 2 extra Magic Power (up to 40 stacks). Upon death, he consumes the absorbed soul fragments to reduce the respawn timer, each reducing the timer by 3% (up to 90%). Enemies that die around Faramis also have a chance to drop soul fragments.

Faramis enters the Shadow state for 3s, gaining 70% extra Movement Speed, 25 extra Physical & Magic Defense, 20% cooldown reduction of this skill, and the ability to move through terrain. Enemy heroes that come into contact with Faramis in this state are dealt 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and applied with a <font color="a6aafb">Nether Mark</font>. Upon leaving the Shadow state, Faramis drags all the marked enemy heroes toward him, dealing 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>. Use again to leave the Shadow state early and drag marked enemies toward him.
The range of soul fragment absorption is increased while this skill is active.

Faramis gathers Nether energy in a fan-shaped area ahead, dealing 330<font color="62f8fe"> (+144% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies within. The energy will then split and bounce to nearby enemies, dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+86% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> (splits up to 2 time(s) on enemy hero hits and 1 time(s) on non-enemy hero hits).

Faramis turns his surroundings into the <font color="a6aafb">Nether Realm</font> for 6s, making affected allied heroes (including himself) enter the <font color="a6aafb">Specter</font> state and granting them 400 plus 10<font color="62f8fe"> (+5% Total Magic Power)</font>% extra HP and 50% extra Movement Speed for 1s. When the <font color="a6aafb">Specter</font> state breaks, the hero will clear all debuffs and enter a brief Resurrection state for 1.3s. An allied hero's <font color="a6aafb">Specter</font> state ends when they leave the <font color="a6aafb">Nether Realm</font>.

data.name: Faramis

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

+5% Cooldown Reduction
+8 Magic Penetration

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

emblemskill.skilldesc: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage greater than <%Num3> of an enemy hero's Max HP <Num2> times within <Num1>s will scorch the target for an additional <Num5> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num6>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Timestream: Hero kills or assists reduce the Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Timestream: Hero kills or assists reduce the Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Adaptive Attack
+600 Extra Max HP
+15% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Scorch: Dealing Magic Damage burns the targets for 3s, also dealing extra Magic Damage equal to 1% of the target's Max HP per second.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Scorch: Dealing Magic Damage burns the targets for 3s, also dealing extra Magic Damage equal to 1% of the target's Max HP per second.
Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+75 Magic Power
+400 Extra Max HP
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing <font color="62f8fe"> (+1.2 Total Magic Power)</font> extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies, speeding up the hero by 30%, which decays over 2s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing <font color="62f8fe"> (+1.2 Total Magic Power)</font> extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies, speeding up the hero by 30%, which decays over 2s.

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

equiplist.equipskill1: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

recommendmasterplan.name: SANTIE
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Coach

data.story: A necromancer in Necrokeep who's determined to find a cure for the Mist.

assist.desc: Faramis works well with heroes that are designed to dive into the enemy, such as Leomord and Martis, as he'll be able to maximize the life-saving effect of his Ultimate.

strong.desc: Faramis' ability to temporarily prevent teammates from being killed makes him a good pick against heroes that go all-in to burst down a target, like Saber and Eudora.

weak.desc: Faramis is countered by high mobility heroes that are difficult for him to catch with his 1st Skill, such as Novaria and Pharsa.
